definitions.definition: a physical or mental condition that limits a person's movements, senses, or activities.
examples: handicap, disablement, incapacity, impairment, infirmity, defect, abnormality; Morecondition, disorder, affliction "my disability makes getting into bed a slow process"Morecondition, disorder, affliction my disability makes getting into bed a slow process

definitions.definition: a disadvantage or handicap, especially one imposed or recognized by the law.
examples: he had to quit his job and go on disability
